column1: Passes are coded by the zones which they occur (o, n, d) followed by the lane (left, center or right).
Pass types (behind net, stretch pass) are noted when applicable (ex. Dsr = stretch pass from right side of defensive zone, ol = pass from left side in offensive zone)
p - low-to-high pass or pass to the point
rr - royal road, or a pass that crosses the middle of the slot
Pass definitions are from Ryan Stimson's Passing Project
